name: Lilycle Rainbow Stage!!!
description: ★The Lilycle Yuri Drama CD series comes to life, featuring an all-star cast, now in a fully-visual adventure game. While Lilycle is a must read for any dedicated yuri fan, it contains a selection of nice and easygoing stories to warm the hearts of one and all!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7+ 处理器: Pentium 4 1.3 GHz 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: VRAM 128MB, 1280x720 Resolution DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 3572 MB 可用空间 声卡: Direct Sound PCM Compatible
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 处理器: E8400 Core 2 Duo 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: VRAM 256MB 存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
